definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: spring, leap, dance (Aram. [[דּוּץ]] be joyous,  dos., leap, dance, be joyous; Ar. d0s. med. [[י]], decline, slip or move about, glide to and fro; Dl:Pr 65, 66 comp. As. dâṣu, withdraw, retreat, but cf. Nö:ZMG 1886, 730)—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Impf. 3 fs. [[תָּדוּץ דְּאָבָה]] Job 41:14 before him danceth dismay.
